review: Works great, picks up all the apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime, HBO Go, etc. The set up is fast and easy plus the interface/screen graphics are very nice. I also like the available app for the I-phone which can be used to speak the commands allowing you to use that as the remote in place of the one that came with the device. Great purchase.
author: Trixie365

review: Bought this as a Christmas present for my mother. She still uses it everyday. She finds more to watch on it, than her regular cable
author: melissa johns "Melissa Johns"

review: Easy to use.  Much less expensive than buying another DVD Player!  Get Amazon Prime, and theFire TV Stick and watch all the best movies free!!!Great!  Cost effective too!  Enjoy!Karen
author: Karen E. Brown-Collier

review: For the most part it is great! However,it caused MLB tv to black us out when we were not in a blackout area. It also quite a bit of buffering although it usually lasted a short time. Except for using it for MLB I would recommend it We have had the stick about three weeks. It was easy to.install and worked right away.
author: MEREDITH MARTIN
